title: News Out of Utah…. It’s Really Bad, Teen Eats ‘Tide Pods’
text:
By economic news
Total:
News Out of Utah…. It’s Really Bad, Teen Eats ‘Tide Pods’
Monday, January 22, 2018 4:39
 
Teenagers do the stupidest things and probably always have. I know I did some insane things in my teens including riding my Honda 400 Super Sport motorcycle while barefoot and shirtless with no helmet carrying a surfboard from Burbank Ca. to the beach on a regular basis. And frankly, I did a hell of a lot of crazier things than that but one thing I never did was eat laundry detergent. 
Apparently, that’s the newest social media craze and not only is it stupid- it’s extremely dangerous.
Teens are daring other teens to eat ‘Tide Pods’ which are described as miniature, neon, detergent-filled pods.
Again, teenagers do the stupidest things.
One student at Utah State University decided to take the dare and eat a pod and as a result she ended up being rushed to the hospital.
Details about her condition were not immediately available.
Campus police called the incident a “Tide Pod overdose.”
